FuncDef: Set the byte size of the optional Data TLV to be included in the ETH-CC PDU. This will increase the size of the ETH-CC PDU by the configured value. The base size of the ETH-CC PDU, including the Interface Status TLV and Port Status TLV, is 83 bytes not including the Layer Two encapsulation.   CCM padding is not supported when the CCM-Interval is less than one second.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the byte size of the Optional Data TLV. Values-3 to 1500.
